catalogProducts: Household Filters for Apartments and Houses

company.title: Atlant Fortuna
company.paragraph1: Atlant Fortuna LLC was established in 2016 to introduce high-tech and innovative water treatment methods to the Uzbekistan market. Our company's main product is water purification systems based on reverse osmosis technology, which is currently the most modern and advanced technology in water treatment. We have the ability to produce systems of various configurations and equipment based on the degree of raw water contamination and customer requirements for the final water.
company.paragraph2: Atlant Fortuna LLC is the first company in Uzbekistan to introduce the production of water purification systems with a capacity of more than 50,000 liters per hour. Since its inception, the company has launched more than 100 water treatment projects with capacities ranging from 1,000 to 50,000 liters per hour. Our water purification systems operate successfully in many sectors of the economy of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
company.paragraph3: We also supply components for water treatment systems such as reverse osmosis membranes, ultrafiltration membranes, cartridge filters, pumps, ion exchange resins and other components manufactured by world-leading water treatment brands such as Hydranautics (USA), TORAY (Japan), DOW Filmtec (USA), VONTRON (China), CSM (South Korea) and others.
